00061 void selectionFinishCallback( void * userData, SoSelection* selection )
00062 {
00063         Trace trace( "selectionFinishCallback", false );
00064     Document* document = static_cast< Document* >( userData  );
00065     if ( document ) document->selectionFinishCBAux( selection );
00066 }
00067 
00068 Document::Document()
00069 : m_root(0), m_scene(0), m_isModified(false)
00070 {
00071     Trace trace( "Document::Document" );
00072         m_root = new SoSelection;
00073         m_root->ref();
00074         
00075     m_root->policy = SoSelection::SINGLE;
00076     m_root->addFinishCallback( selectionFinishCallback, static_cast< void*>( this ) );
00077          
00078     InitializeScene();          
00079 }
00080 
00081 Document::~Document()
00082 {
00083         Trace trace( "Document::~Document" );
00084         if ( m_root ) m_root->unref();
00085 }
00086 
00087 void Document::SetDocumentModified( bool status )
00088 {
00089     Trace trace( "Document::SetDocumentModified" );
00090     m_isModified = status;
00091 }
00092 
00093 void Document::InitializeScene()
00094 {
00095     Trace trace( "Document::InitializeScene", false );
00096         if ( m_scene ) ClearScene();
00097         
00098         m_scene = new SoSceneKit;
00099         m_root->addChild( m_scene ); 
00100     m_scene->setSearchingChildren( true );      
00101 }
00102 
00103 void Document::New()
00104 {
00105     Trace trace( "Document::New", false );
00106         InitializeScene();
00107         m_isModified = false;
00108 }
00109 
00110 void Document::ClearScene()
00111 {
00112     Trace trace( "Document::ClearScene", false );
00113     if( m_root )
00114     {
00115         if ( m_scene )
00116         {
00117             if ( m_root ) m_root->removeChild( m_scene );
00118                 if ( m_scene ) while ( m_scene->getRefCount( ) > 1 ) m_scene->unref();
00119         }
00120     }
00121     
00122     m_scene = 0; 
00123 }
00124 
00125 bool Document::ReadFile( const QString& fileName )
00126 {
00127     Trace trace( "Document::ReadFile" );
00128         if( SoSceneKit* inputScene = GetSceneKitFromFile( fileName ) )
00129         {
00130         if ( m_scene ) ClearScene();
00131             m_scene = inputScene;
00132             m_root->addChild( m_scene );
00133             m_scene->setSearchingChildren( true );
00134             m_isModified = false;
00135             return true;
00136         }
00137         return false;
00138 }
00139 
00140 bool Document::WriteFile( const QString& fileName )
00141 {
00142     Trace trace( "Document::WriteFile" );
00143     SoWriteAction SceneOuput;
00144     if ( !SceneOuput.getOutput()->openFile( fileName.toLatin1().constData() ) ) 
00145         {
00146         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
00147                               tr( "Cannot open file %1:\n%2. " )
00148                             .arg( fileName ));
00149                 return false;
00150         }
00151         
00152     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor ); 
00153         SceneOuput.getOutput()->setBinary( false );
00154         SceneOuput.apply( m_scene );
00155         SceneOuput.getOutput()->closeFile(); 
00156         QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00157         m_isModified = false;
00158         return true;
00159 }
00160 
00161 bool Document::IsModified( )
00162 {
00163     Trace trace( "Document::IsModified" );
00164     return m_isModified;
00165 }

00167 SoSelection* Document::GetRoot() const
00168 {
00169     Trace trace( "Document::GetRoot" );
00170         return m_root;
00171 }
00172 
00173 SoSceneKit* Document::GetSceneKit() const
00174 {
00175     Trace trace( "Document::GetSceneKit" );
00176     return m_scene;
00177 }

00179        
00180 SoSceneKit* Document::GetSceneKitFromFile( const QString& fileName )
00181 {
00182     Trace trace( "Document::GetSceneKitFromFile" );
00183         SoInput sceneInput;
00184         if ( !sceneInput.openFile( fileName.toLatin1().constData() ) ) 
00185         {
00186         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Scene Graph Structure" ),
00187                               tr( "Cannot open file %1:\n%2." )
00188                             .arg( fileName ) );
00189                 return 0;
00190         }
00191         
00192         SoSeparator* graphSeparator = SoDB::readAll( &sceneInput );
00193         sceneInput.closeFile();
00194         
00195         if ( !graphSeparator )
00196         {
00197         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Scene Graph Structure" ),
00198                               tr( "Error reading file %1:\n%2." )
00199                              .arg( fileName ) );
00200                 return 0;
00201         }
00202 
00203    return static_cast< SoSceneKit* >( graphSeparator->getChild(0) );   
00204 }

00206 void Document::selectionFinishCBAux( SoSelection* selection )
00207 {
00208     Trace trace( "Document::selectionFinishCBAux", false );
00209         emit selectionFinish( selection );
00210 }
